columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the IAM policy.

columns.name: create_date
columns.description: The date and time when the SAML provider was created.

columns.name: valid_until
columns.description: The expiration date and time for the SAML provider.

columns.name: saml_metadata_document
columns.description: The XML metadata document that includes information about an identity provider.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to the specified IAM SAML provider.
